articles.description: Realme X3 SuperZoom phone is set to launch on May 26. Now ahead of the phone's launch, a report is indicating that the Realme X3 SuperZoom will arrive in India by mid-June.

articles.title: Google Meet is expected to soon allow users to blur background during video calls - Firstpost
articles.description: Google might be preparing to test the option of automatically blurring the background in Meet calls on the Android app.
articles.content:
